title: Walmart is selling a $470 swivel rocker patio set for $270
content:
TheStreet aims to feature only the best products and services. If you buy something via one of our links, we may earn a commission.

Outdoor furniture can sometimes be overlooked when it comes to decorating your home. However, if you choose the right patio set, it can open up a whole new area of fun and relaxation outside the confines of your home's traditional living spaces. is currently offering a Flash deal on an attractive and comfortable patio set, and we think it would be a worthy addition to almost any patio or backyard.

The is on sale for $270. That's an almost inconceivable 43% off the regular price of $470. This is a deal that surely won't last long, so put one in your cart while you still can.

Included in this elegant set are two high-back swivel rocking chairs and a small bistro table. Each piece is made from thick powder-coated stainless steel and wrapped in weather-resistant PE rattan wicker. Aside from being a great outdoor all-weather material, the wicker gives this set a rugged yet refined look.

The table has a shatterproof tempered glass top, which is not only sturdy but also beautiful and easy to clean. Comfort is paramount for any lounge set, which is why the thick cushions on these chairs are the perfect fit. The covers are removable and machine-washable for added convenience. You can get this set in six color variations, so there's something to match everyone's individual patio aesthetic. Even with a $50 shipping fee, it's an incredible deal.

Walmart shoppers found this set to be top shelf. One called the set "superb," saying it was an "excellent choice for hosting." They added that "this furniture is of exceptional quality, simple to install, and durable."

Another buyer described it as "very lovely," adding, "It has revolutionized my patio, evoking the sensation of a tropical retreat." This customer ended their review with a simple directive: "Purchase it immediately."

The is the perfect pick for any patio, large or small. The current price of just $270 is simply too good to pass up, so get yours ASAP. You may not have much more time to take advantage of this rocking good deal.

keywords.name: an attractive and comfortable patio set

summary: Walmart is selling a $470 swivel rocker patio set for $270, a 43% discount from the regular price of $470. The set includes two high-back rocking chairs and a small bistro table. Each piece is made from powder-coated stainless steel and wrapped in weather-resistant PE rattan wicker, giving it a rugged yet refined look. The table has a shatterproof tempered glass top, making it beautiful and easy to clean. Despite a $50 shipping fee, this deal is too good to pass up.
shortSummary: Walmart is selling a $470 swivel rocker patio set for $270, offering excellent quality, durable furniture, and easy to install, all for just $50 shipping fee.

argos_summary: TheStreet highlights a Flash deal on a stylish patio furniture set, currently priced at $270, which is 43% off its regular price of $470. The set includes two high-back swivel rocking chairs and a bistro table made from durable materials, featuring weather-resistant PE rattan wicker and a shatterproof tempered glass top. Customers have praised the set for its quality, comfort, and aesthetic appeal, making it a great addition to any outdoor space.
